channel.title: Need help fixing spirit shields on my server!
channel.description:
The spirit shields look really weird, they're like dented into the characters body: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/854/spiritshield.png/][IMG]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/6504/spiritshield.png[/img][/URL]
I'm not to sure what kind of server mine is, but i don't have the file 'class8.java' which i believe is in all 317's. Anyway please someone help if you know how to fix this! When i run the server the source is BrokenX v2
